attributes.action: To have a debate about how much money is being wasted on MPs discussing Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Other areas are being neglected because of Brexit such as the NHS, Social Care, Housing, education and crime. This is not morally right to forget about the taxpayer's concerns to work on something that politicians know very little about. There should have been discussion on leaving the EU as to whether it would be possible. Instead, the Prime Minister called a referendum without knowing how to carry out a Brexit Vote. People's welfare and country was not at the front of their mind.
attributes.background: We were asked whether we want to leave the EU. The actions of MPs havedemonstrated that no one has a solution and knows what is going to happen. Weeks of parliamentary time is being used up on it. From my observations, these debates are not moving anything on

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you would like disclosed.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to publish the costs of its Brexit preparations and negotiations if that is something you would like to see happen.
